title: The Joker's Henchman - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/8/20
itunes:title: The Joker's Henchman - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/8/20
description:
Guest host Ian Punnett and actor David Dastmalchian (Suicide Squad 2, Ant Man) discuss his acting career and how he used his recovery from drug addiction to inspire his memorable performance in the award winning Batman movie 'The Dark Knight.'

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
